name: returnMetric
description: Get configdb metric within time-range

startDate.description: Date in yyyy-MM-dd format or any Number format. If a number is passed, that will be the number of minutes. The start/end will be translated as <current date/time – minutes passed> and <current date/time> respectively.

endDate.description: Date in yyyy-MM-dd format. The end date is given if data from multiple dates needs to be extracted. If single date data needed then endDate can be empty. endDate cannot be a previous date to the startDate.

start.description: Start Time in HHMMSS format; Time in UTC timezone

end.description: End Time in HHMMSS format; Time in UTC timezone

limit.description: The numbers of items to return on given Page Number
